oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Confederate Veterans uniform
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: UCV uniform of Sgt. John Cloar, Co. A, 33rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, of Union City, Tenn. On the vest is a Southern Cross of Honor bestowed by the United Daughters of the Confederacy (UDC) and battle flag pin. A Confederate flag handkerchief is in the vest pocket. Vest buttons bear letters "UCV." Frock coat muffin buttons display CSA battle flag.
